content: this is snowflake #5 in the book of 100 snowflakes instructions are on page 46 picture is on page 22 in showcase this pretty snowflake might have been carried down on a nevada a cold wind blowing form a mountain glacier finished diameter 2-1/4 in 57 mm thread required 5 yd 4 6 m all pattern samples in this book are made with size 10 thread and a size 5 1 9 mm crochet hook this pattern is one of 10 featured from the book on lion brand s website lion brand recommends lion brand bonbons cotton yarn with a 3 5 mm e hook or 3 75 mm f hook
